info.description: This is a Protocol One payment solution service.
info.title: Protocol One payment solution swagger documentation

get.description: Get full list of currencies or get list of currencies filtered by name

parameters.description: name or symbolic ISO 3166-1 code of country
parameters.name: name

get.description: Get country object by numeric ISO 3166-1 code
get.summary: Get country by numeric ISO 3166-1 code

parameters.description: numeric ISO 3166-1 country code
parameters.name: id

get.description: Get full list of currencies or get list of currencies filtered by name

parameters.description: name or symbolic ISO 4217 code of currency
parameters.name: name

get.description: Get currency object by numeric ISO 4217 code
get.summary: Get currency by numeric ISO 4217 code

parameters.description: numeric ISO 4217 currency code
parameters.name: id

post.description: Create a payment order use POST JSON request

parameters.description: Order create data
parameters.name: data

200.description: Object with url to form entering payment requisites

parameters.description: Merchant object with new data
parameters.name: data

parameters.description: Creating merchant data
parameters.name: data

get.description: Get list of project for authenticated merchant

post.description: Create new project for authenticated merchant

parameters.description: Creating project data
parameters.name: data

parameters.description: Project identifier
parameters.name: data

parameters.description: Project object with new data
parameters.name: data

parameters.description: Project identifier
parameters.name: id

get.description: Create a payment order use GET or POST HTML form

parameters.description: Project unique identifier in Protocol One payment solution
parameters.name: PP_PROJECT_ID

parameters.description: Order amount
parameters.name: PP_AMOUNT

parameters.description: User unique account in project
parameters.name: PP_ACCOUNT

parameters.description: Unique order identifier in project. This field not required, BUT we're recommend send this field always
parameters.name: PP_ORDER_ID

parameters.description: Payment method identifier in Protocol One payment solution
parameters.name: PP_PAYMENT_METHOD

parameters.description: Order description. If this field not send in request, then we're create standard order description
parameters.name: PP_DESCRIPTION

parameters.description: Order currency by ISO 4217 (3 chars). If this field send, then we're process amount in this currency
parameters.name: PP_CURRENCY

parameters.description: User (payer) region code by ISO 3166-1 (2 chars) for check project packages. If this field not send, then user region will be get from user ip
parameters.name: PP_REGION

parameters.description: User (payer) email
parameters.name: PP_PAYER_EMAIL

parameters.description: User (payer) phone
parameters.name: PP_PAYER_PHONE

parameters.description: URL for payment data verification request to project. This field can be send if it allowed in project admin panel
parameters.name: PP_URL_VERIFY

parameters.description: URL for payment notification request to project. This field can be send if it allowed in project admin panel
parameters.name: PP_URL_NOTIFY

parameters.description: URL for redirect user after successfully completed payment. This field can be send if it allowed in project admin panel
parameters.name: PP_URL_SUCCESS

parameters.description: URL for redirect user after failed payment. This field can be send if it allowed in project admin panel
parameters.name: PP_URL_FAIL

parameters.description: Signature of request to verify that the data has not been changed. This field not required, BUT we're recommend send this field always
parameters.name: PP_SIGNATURE

parameters.description: Any fields on the project side that do not match the names of the reserved fields
parameters.name: Other

302.description: Redirect user to form entering payment requisites

400.description: Redirect user to page with error description

500.description: Redirect user to page with error description

302.description: Redirect user to form entering payment requisites

400.description: Redirect user to page with error description

500.description: Redirect user to page with error description

created_at.description: CreatedAt date of create country in system
CreatedAt date of create currency in system8

accounting_period.description: AccountingPeriod period payout of money to merchant bank account. Now available next values: day - every day, week - every week, 2week - every two week, month - every month, quarter - every quarter, half-year - every half-year, year - every year

country.description: Country full object of country where merchant company registered

created_at.description: CreatedAt date of create merchant in system

currency.description: Country full object describes merchant's accounting currency

external_id.description: ExternalId unique merchant identifier in auth system

status.description: Status merchant status in system. Now available next statuses: 0 - created, 1 - verified, 2 - active, 3 - deleted

accounting_period.description: AccountingPeriod period payout of money to merchant bank account. Now available next values: day - every day, week - every week, 2week - every two week, month - every month, quarter - every quarter, half-year - every half-year, year - every year

currency.description: Currency numeric ISO 4217 currency code describes merchant's accounting currency

id.description: Id unique merchant identifier in auth system

status.description: Status merchant status in system. Now available next statuses: 0 - created, 1 - verified, 2 - active, 3 - deleted

account.description: Account User unique account in project

currency.description: Currency Order currency by ISO 4217 (3 chars). If this field send, then we're process amount in this currency

description.description: Description Order description. If this field not send in request, then we're create standard order description

order_id.description: OrderId Unique order identifier in project. This field not required, BUT we're recommend send this field always

other.description: Other Object with any fields on the project side that do not match the names of the reserved fields

payment_method.description: PaymentMethod Payment method identifier in Protocol One payment solution

project.description: ProjectId Project unique identifier in Protocol One payment solution

region.description: Region User (payer) region code by ISO 3166-1 (2 chars) for check project packages. If this field not send, then user region will be get from user ip

signature.description: Signature Signature of request to verify that the data has not been changed. This field not required, BUT we're recommend send this field always

url_fail.description: UrlFail URL for redirect user after failed payment. This field can be send if it allowed in project admin panel

url_notify.description: UrlNotify URL for payment notification request to project. This field can be send if it allowed in project admin panel

url_success.description: UrlSuccess URL for redirect user after successfully completed payment. This field can be send if it allowed in project admin panel

url_verify.description: UrlVerify URL for payment data verification request to project. This field can be send if it allowed in project admin panel

callback_currency.description: CallbackCurrency full object of currency which described currency to send payment notification

callback_protocol.description: CallbackProtocol protocol identifier to send payment notification. Now available: default

create_invoice_allowed_urls.description: CreateInvoiceAllowedUrls list of urls rom which you can send a request to create an order

fixed_package.description: FixedPackage list of project's fixed packages

is_allow_dynamic_notify_urls.description: IsAllowDynamicNotifyUrls is allow send dynamic notification urls in request to create an order

is_allow_dynamic_redirect_urls.description: IsAllowDynamicRedirectUrls is allow send dynamic user's redirect urls in request to create an order

limits_currency.description: LimitsCurrency full object of currency which describes currency for amount's limit

max_payment_amount.description: MaxPaymentAmount maximal amount allowed for create order

min_payment_amount.description: MinPaymentAmount minimal amount allowed for create order

notify_emails.description: NotifyEmails list of emails to send notifications about successfully completed payment operations

only_fixed_amounts.description: OnlyFixedAmounts is allow create order only with amounts from fixed packages list

payment_methods.description: FixedPackage list of payment methods allowed to project

secret_key.description: SecretKey secret key for create check hash for request about order statuses changes

send_notify_email.description: SendNotifyEmail is allow send notifications about successfully completed payment operations to user's emails

url_check_account.description: URLCheckAccount default url to send request for verification payment data to project

url_process_payment.description: URLProcessPayment default url to send request for notification about successfully completed payment to project

url_redirect_fail.description: URLRedirectFail default url to redirect user after failed payment

url_redirect_success.description: URLRedirectSuccess default url to redirect user after successfully completed payment

callback_currency.description: CallbackCurrency ISO 4217 numeric currency code to send payment notification

callback_protocol.description: CallbackProtocol protocol identifier to send payment notification. Now available: default

create_invoice_allowed_urls.description: CreateInvoiceAllowedUrls list of urls rom which you can send a request to create an order

fixed_package.description: FixedPackage list of project's fixed packages

is_allow_dynamic_notify_urls.description: IsAllowDynamicNotifyUrls is allow send dynamic notification urls in request to create an order

is_allow_dynamic_redirect_urls.description: IsAllowDynamicRedirectUrls is allow send dynamic user's redirect urls in request to create an order

limits_currency.description: LimitsCurrency ISO 4217 numeric currency code for limit amounts

max_payment_amount.description: MaxPaymentAmount maximal amount allowed for create order

min_payment_amount.description: MinPaymentAmount minimal amount allowed for create order

notify_emails.description: NotifyEmails list of emails to send notifications about successfully completed payment operations

only_fixed_amounts.description: OnlyFixedAmounts is allow create order only with amounts from fixed packages list

secret_key.description: SecretKey secret key for create check hash for request about order statuses changes

send_notify_email.description: SendNotifyEmail is allow send notifications about successfully completed payment operations to user's emails

url_check_account.description: URLCheckAccount default url to send request for verification payment data to project

url_process_payment.description: URLProcessPayment default url to send request for notification about successfully completed payment to project

url_redirect_fail.description: URLRedirectFail default url to redirect user after failed payment

url_redirect_success.description: URLRedirectSuccess default url to redirect user after successfully completed payment
